        public ValueAnimator.Builder set_count(float start,
                                       float end,
                                       int precision)
        Set the start_animation and end floating point numbers to be animated
        Parameters:
        start - initial value
        end - final value
        precision - number of decimal places to use
        Returns:
        This Builder object to allow chaining methods.

        Parameters:

        This Builder object to allow chaining methods.

      • set_repeat

        public ValueAnimator.Builder set_repeat(int repeat_mode,
                                        int repeat_count)
        Set repetition related variables.
        Parameters:
        repeat_mode - The mode, either: REVERSE or REPEAT
        repeat_count - The amount of repetitions (set to 0 for none and INFINITE for never-ending)
        Returns:
        This Builder object to allow chaining methods.

      • build

        public ValueAnimator build()
        Creates a ValueAnimator with the arguments supplied to this builder. It does not ValueAnimator.execute(AnimateListener) the ValueAnimator. Use ValueAnimator.execute(AnimateListener) to start_animation the animation
